casebody.data:
LAW OFFICE OF BRUCE J. CHASAN, LLC and Bruce Chasan, Esquire, Petitioners
v.
FREUNSLICH & LITTMAN, LLC and Gregory Littman, Esquire, Respondents No. 227 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. November 21, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 21 st day of November, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The decision of the Superior Court is REVERSED. See Ryan v. Johnson, 522 Pa. 555 , 564 A.2d 1237 (1989). The case is REMANDED to the Superior Court for consideration of the merits of the appeal.
